comment.body: Everyone knows the blue hub is the cool kids hub and anyone who is anyone is part of it
How did you get a fancy circle?
It's a heart and you're following them they don't follow you unless they choose to so they don't see your page unless they follow you
The replies are smaller and below the post they are replying to and they don't have circles next to them

Hubs are like gangs, you make one and you wear the gang colours and you all hang around doing hub stuff. Then you see someone from another gang and to talk to them you have to allow their gang onto your turf by hosting the hub and then you can meet with anyone in that gang and talk to them.

If you don't want anything to do with another gang then you don't have to let them into your turf and host them but that means you can't talk with anyone in that gang.
You just comment on the post, I don't think there is any fancy replying comments
How can I make my own hub using my own address and move my page to it?

Hubs are just the folders the profiles go into, as soon as you visit the page of someone in a hub you start hosting that hub and you can see everyone else in that hub. If you visit a hub directly then it has the same effect.
Maybe just try again a few times, it doesn't always work
No but it would help
We need a feature that lets us reply to people properly by clicking on their name in the comments
Rejected
It wouldn't really work if it requires everyone to host every video, I don't have the space for billions of hours of footage.
I see a comment by you in the activity feed but it's not there under my post for me, I don't know if you deleted it or something but it's weird
Ooh kaffie hacked, typical red
It shows up in our activity feeds but nobody can see it directly
I can see these comments, it's just that one comment so it's probably fine
What about the people in infinity?
I think there is a couple of double hubbers, I noticed their folders in the folder structure
@Kaffie I probably did double hub, but I don't think it has broken anything
We know how to make it, we just need someone to make it
Once there is a new hub how do we migrate our pages over?
Good because I know nothing

@Nofish: It works but it doesn't look very good since it's like you just typed it out. It needs fancy styling and no '@'. Even just making the name bold or something would look better. So it's just Nofish: but in bold

VeraCrypt seems to be on linux so use that. If you make a hidden volume inside your encrypted drive then it's undetectable so if they torture you just give them the password to the drive and not the hidden part and they are none the wiser.

@Musickiller: If your drive is open and an attacker has access to the hardware then of course you are totally fucked. Veracrypt decrypts as files are needed but if they have control of the OS then it will just give them everything.
I've never heard of that before, it's interesting
Then don't get infected with spyware.
no
Over 410 now
Me!
Can we have a list of people following us on our profile page?

>Follow new profile followers in the newsfeed

What does that mean?
@Nofish: If we can have that then why can't we see a list of who follows us?
Or just pirate it
I hope not
@RiotPulv: But then you can't use it in a normal browser
Having a server in a data centre would be a cool way to guarantee good download speeds
@Dxtjgxz: Go to rarbg, it's better than trusting random links which may have no seeds or be terrible quality
